question_text: Ali ibn Nafi’ who was born in 789 CE established the first music school in Cordoba. The sentence which emphasises the underlined words is ………………………

choices.A: it was in 789 CE that Ali ibn Nafi’ established the first music school in Cordoba.
choices.B: the person who established the first music school in Cordoba was Ali ibn Nafi’.
choices.C: the year when Ali ibn Nafi’ established the first music school in Cordoba was 789 CE.
choices.D: the thing that Ali ibn Nafi’ established in Cordoba was the first music school.
